name: eikon-parcel-starter
description: Web projects starterkit for eikon students

scripts.dev: npm run clean:cache && parcel src/index.html src/artists/index.html src/artists/ya-seen.html
scripts.build: npm run clean:output && parcel build src/index.html src/artists/index.html src/artists/ya-seen.html --public-url './' --no-cache && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist/artists/css && cp -r dist/css/* dist/artists/css/ && mkdir -p dist/artists/js && cp -r dist/js/* dist/artists/js/ && mkdir -p dist/artists/img && cp -r dist/img/* dist/artists/img/ && sed -i '' 's|href="artists/ya-seen.html"|href="ya-seen.html"|g' dist/artists/index.html && sed -i '' 's|href="artists/index.html"|href="/artists/index.html"|g' dist/artists/index.html dist/artists/ya-seen.html dist/index.html

author: eikon frontend development team
